resources.string: This is a sample app created with the intention of learning how to build various features of Android. Each feature built can be found in the navigation drawer to the left.
Use the Log class to log different types of information based on severity - e.g. error, debug, warnings
Create an Activity and open another Activity from button click.
This is another activity. This should be accessed by button click within the activity example.
Create two custom Fragments and attach them both to a single activity.
Use a variety of Snackbars, Toasts and Dialogs to display information to the user.
Allow a user to click a button to launch a notification. When the Notification is clicked launch a different Activity.
Attach a view to an already inflated layout. You may create the view (e.g. a TextView) and then atach it to the Activity layout on button click.
